job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support, focusing on complex issues that AI cannot yet fully resolve
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the integration of AI capabilities into a customer support system, which is a form of software integration to enhance functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: apply human expertise to areas where AI falls short, and then close the gap by improving the AI system
job_tasks.justification: This describes the process of improving an AI system by applying human expertise to its shortcomings, which aligns with model improvement and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions and providing feedback for improvement, which is a core aspect of model development and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new tools and methodologies, especially in the context of AI, falls under the broader umbrella of software development and integration, preparing them for potential use.

soft_skills.phrase: Taking two whole months to get up to speed; you will be expected to ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
soft_skills.justification: This highlights an expectation of rapid learning and adaptation to new products and systems, which is a key aspect of learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Relying on your managers for help; if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
soft_skills.justification: This emphasizes the need for self-sufficiency and problem-solving skills, indicating that the candidate must be adept at unblocking themselves.

profile.rationale: The job description focuses on integrating AI capabilities into customer support systems and improving existing AI systems through feedback and fine-tuning. While there's mention of AI model fine-tuning (1.B.1), the primary emphasis is on applying human expertise to resolve issues where AI falls short and improving the AI system itself, which is a form of integration and enhancement of existing AI tools within a broader application context (1.A.1). There's no indication of building AI models from scratch or deep specialization in generative AI techniques beyond improving existing systems. The role is about supporting and enhancing AI-driven customer resolutions rather than core AI development or research. Therefore, 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' is the most fitting profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to AI system improvement and integration into customer support. While it mentions 'AI model fine-tuning', the overall context suggests a role focused on applying and refining existing AI rather than deep model development or generative AI specialization. The soft skills mentioned also align well with the profile. The confidence is high, but not perfect, as the term 'AI-Augmented Customer Resolutions' could be interpreted slightly differently, but the subsequent points clarify the nature of the work.
